Name: Lonely Birds
About the game: A puzzler where you reunite separated PEARakeets (that's right, the pairs of parakeets are pears!) with their match by clicking on pairs of animals to make them move towards each other. The initial challenge is to move the birds without having them block each other from matching. Later you'll find some animals are linked and always try to move together. Add into the mix a springy tree that bounces the animals around and you've got some truly perplexing puzzles. Already with 85+ challenging puzzles (and plenty more on the way), Lonely Birds offers countless hours of gameplay and fun for puzzle-loving players! Bring your own ideas to life and play community created levels with our built-in level editor! Head over to the Steam Community Hub to find and share levels.
